titles.title: A bill for the relief of Gregory E. Walters.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual in full satisfaction of claims arising out of allegations made against the Tennessee Valley Authority, with whom he was employed, regarding a home insulation program.
